title: User wants PDF of Request Bulletin attached to notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Club or BOC 
AND a Waiver Request Bulletin containing one or more waiver requests has been sent, or notifications re-sent
custom_steps: WHEN user receives notification on their clipboard that the Request Bulletin is available
custom_expected:
THEN description of the notification generated by the sending of the request bulletin or the resending of notifications should be clickable
AND clicking on the description should download the associated pdf of the request bulletin

title: User wants to access Waiver Request Date from Waivers section of player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to view waivers screen
AND user has navigated to the Waiver History section of a Pro Player Profile
AND "Date Requested" column is a hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN system should take the user to the Waivers screen with the relevant Request Date selected

title: BOC User wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to notification they receive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC
AND a Waiver Result Bulletin has been sent (or notifications re-sent) for a specific waiver request date
AND user has received a notification on their clipboard that the Result Bulletin is available
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to notification clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN description of the notification should be clickable
AND clicking on the description should download the associated pdf of the results bulletin

title: Club user wants PDF of results bulletin attached to notification they receive
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in with permissions to view a waiver results bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN user receives a notification that a result bulletin has been sent (or notifications resent)
custom_expected:
THEN "Description" in the notifications widget should be clickable
AND clicking on the description should download the associated pdf of the results bulletin

title: User wants PDF of Request Bulletin attached to email they receive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has a valid email entered in the email utility to receive request bulletin emails for Club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN When the Waiver Request bulletin is sent for the first time or resent
custom_expected:
THEN emails generated by the system should have the pdf of the day's bulletin attached
BUT If no entries exist, then no attachment should be provided

title: User wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to the email they receive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND email addresses have been entered in Waivers section of email utility for BOC and one or more clubs
custom_steps: WHEN a Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN Waiver Results email received by BOC and Club users entered on email utility should have a PDF of the day's bulletin attached 
BUT if no entries exist, then no attachment should be provided

title: User does not want to see Claim Period and Withdrawal Period expiration dates for dates with no requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a request date for which a Request Bulletin has been sent with no requests entered
custom_expected:
THEN system should not display the Claim Expiration Date or the Withdrawal Expiration Date fields for this Request Date
AND Ribbon should say "No Requests" in place of the claim or withdrawal expiration date if a Request Bulletin is sent with no Requests

title: BOC user wants Waiver Expiration Batch to run multiple times a day
custom_preconds: GIVEN one or more players exist with unexpired waivers that have reached their expiration date
custom_steps: WHEN current time is equal to 1PM EST (every day)
custom_expected:
THEN Waiver expiration batch should run automatically
AND Batch should automatically expire any waivers that have reached their expiration date
AND for each record, system should set Respective Waiver Effective Flag to 0 and Waiver Effective Date to null on player profile

title: User wants to view existing Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to advanced search for waivers
AND user has navigated to Advanced Search screen
AND "Waiver Claim Assignment" is an option in Transactions Advanced Search in the "Transaction Type"
custom_steps: WHEN user conducts  an advanced search for "Waiver Claim Assignment"
custom_expected:
THEN system should properly return the results from ebis1
AND clicking on the date should open the associated waiver claim assignment
AND form should match the provided wireframe and data discoveries
AND same behavior should be present in the associated players' player histories

title: BOC user wants to be able to preview PDF of Request or Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND user has permissions to view Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a specific request date on Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should always see a "Print" button
AND if the Request Bulletin has not yet been sent, user will only see the "Request Bulletin" option
AND if the Request Bulletin has not yet been sent, clicking "Print>Request Bulletin" should generate PDF using current saved info
BUT if the Request Bulletin has been sent, but not the Results Bulletin, user should see "Result Bulletin" as an option as well as Request Bulletin
AND if the Result Bulletin has not yet been sent, clicking "Print>Result Bulletin" should generate the pdf using the current saved information and should not show the detailed results for waivers that will be secured
AND if no Requests exist for the date then no Print button should display

title: Club user wants to print PDF of Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen
AND user has selected a request date for which the Result Bulletin has already been sent
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow user to select "Result Bulletin" from the options available
AND selecting Result Bulletin should download a pdf of that day's Result Bulletin for the viewing Org to the user's computer
AND if no Requests exist for the date then no Print button should display

title: Update Print button on Waivers screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to print waiver bulletins
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a request date with a bulletin available
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Print button
AND Print button should be a dropdown instead of split button
AND clicking Print should reveal 1 or 2 options depending on the date, Request Bulletin and Results Bulletin

title: User wants to generate Player Notification for a view Waiver Claim Results - Claimed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND user's club has Requested UR Waivers for a player that have been claimed but have not been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the relevant bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Player Notif. button for any UR waiver request that was not Cancelled
AND clicking the Player Notif. button should open the “Notice to Player of UR waiver claim and Right to Terminate Contract" if claimed

title: User wants to generate Player Notification for a view Waiver Claim Results - Unclaimed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND user's club has Requested UR Waivers for a player that have been not been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the relevant bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Player Notif. button for any UR waiver request that was not Cancelled
AND clicking the Player Notif. button should open the “Notice to Player of UR waiver claim and Right to Terminate Contract" letter to the player in a new window if un-claimed
AND if the language selected in the player's professional player profile is Spanish then the letter should print in Spanish
BUT if the language selected in the player's professional player profile is not Spanish then the letter should print in English

title: User wants to generate Notice to Player of UR waiver claim and Right to Terminate Contract Letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user is logged in
AND a Player has been Unconditionally Released as a result of UR waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Released player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "Notice to Player of Unconditional Release & termination of M/L contract" should appear as an option in the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters"
AND selecting this option should print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile
AND users should have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND users should have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND users should have the ability to enter the Expiration Date to be populated on the form
AND if the language on player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish, form should be generated in English
BUT if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish, form should be generated in Spanish
AND PDF should follow provided format and details

title: User wants to generate Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League contract letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Create New Menu on a Professional Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN "Notice to Player of Unconditional Release & termination of M/L contract" should appear as an option under "Player Letters"
AND selecting this option should print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile
AND users should have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND users should have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND users should have the ability to enter the Release Date to be populated on the form
AND form should be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish
BUT form should be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish
AND pdf should follow the provided format and details
